alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Floyd; Haralson; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 17 at 2:13PM EDT until October 19 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures around 30 are expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures near 30 possible. * WHERE...Floyd, Polk, Haralson and Carroll Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 11 AM EDT Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
